feed.title: LANCommander Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for LANCommander: v0.8.1
entry.content:
Server

  • Fixed: Edit button on collection list works now
  • Fixed: Time spans now render correctly in dashboards
  • Fixed: Game field is now auto focused under Profile -> Saves
  • Added: Collections can now be added from Metadata -> Collections
  • Added: robots.txt has been added to avoid scraping of authentication views
  • Added: Allow updating of manual name after upload
  • Added: Play sessions can now be viewed/removed for an individual game under "Edit"

Playnite Extension

  • Fixed: Implemented experimental fix for archives that contain files larger than 4GB

Launcher Preview

  • Added: Uncategorized collection has been added containing games that don't belong to any collection
  • Added: Show transfer speed while downloading
  • Fixed: Download percentage no longer show NaN when starting
  • Fixed: Added error when games fail to install
  • Fixed: Title sorting now ignores articles such as "A", "The", etc
  • Fixed: Trigger import on login
  • Fixed: Removed duplicated successful import notification
  • Fixed: Adjusted overall style of background/logo art
  • Fixed: Implemented experimental fix for archives that contain files larger than 4GB
  • Note: This version of the new launcher preview will not execute PowerShell scripts, it is fixed in v0.8.2+

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/compare/v0.8.0...v0.8.1

entry.title: New release for LANCommander: v0.8.2
entry.content:
Server

  • Added: Game manuals can now be automatically grabbed from Steam using the media picker
  • Added: Admins can now download other users' saves
  • Added: Platforms for games can now be specified
  • Added: Experimental Linux ARM now available (not tested, for all the Raspberry Pi users out there)
  • Fixed: Official game images from Steam are now listed in the media picker
  • Changed: Viewing saves for a game has moved to the game edit view

Client

  • Added: The list of games can now be filtered based on supplied metadata and install state
  • Fixed: The Play button will now update to Running faster when starting a game
  • Fixed: Automatic builds now correctly include PowerShell

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/compare/v0.8.1...v0.8.2

entry.title: New release for LANCommander: v0.8.3
entry.content:
Server

  • Added: Launcher can be automatically downloaded to the server on update (enabled under Settings / Updates)
  • Added: Servers can now be exported/imported

PowerShell Cmdlets (Launcher and Playnite Extension)

  • Added: Refresh rate to Get-PrimaryDisplay is now accessible via .RefreshRate
  • Added: Width/height added as first level properties for Get-PrimaryDisplay, i.e. .Width and .Height
  • Added: New cmdlet Update-IniValue allows setting an INI value (see the wiki for more details)

Launcher

  • Fixed: Launcher no longer crashes if game startup is canceled prematurely (most likely denying UAC prompt)
  • Fixed: Non-primary actions are available again
  • Fixed: Manuals are now downloaded properly upon install
  • Fixed: Importing indicator is now properly centered
  • Fixed: Importing speed has improved (on a local network install with 270+ games, import runs about 55% faster)
  • Fixed: Metadata headers will no longer show if a game doesn't have that type of metadata populated

Docker

  • Added: Python 3 runtime now accessible in the container (Thanks @miketweaver!)

Launcher Feedback

With this release we are nearing ever closer to a v0.9.0 which will contain the first official release of the LANCommander launcher. If you have been trying the preview and have feedback, please submit a new issue and mark it appropriately (bug vs enhancement). Not all requests will make it into v0.9.0 as I don't expect the launcher to change all that much for the release, but feel free to submit any feedback!

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/compare/v0.8.2...v0.8.3

entry.title: New release for LANCommander: v0.8.4
entry.content:
Server

  • Added: More logging for frontend errors
  • Fixed: Controls under Settings / Updates have been fixed (#81)
  • Fixed: Server importing now sets Path, Arguments, and Use Shell Export properly

Launcher

  • Added: Settings can now be managed from the profile menu
  • Added: Variables passed into scripts are now listed when script debugging is enabled
  • Added: Server instances that have no collections defined will now display a simplified game list (#77)
  • Fixed: Media is now only read if it exists on the local disk
  • Fixed: Non-primary game actions are now ordered by sort order
  • Fixed: Avatar is now displayed properly when profile menu is clicked (#79)
  • Fixed: PowerShell module now has its zone identifier cleared on application start (#80)
  • Fixed: Filter menu rendering now loads faster
  • Fixed: Grouping of games by collection has been simplified and should be slightly faster
  • Fixed: Play session start/end is now reported properly to the server (#76)
  • Fixed: Library list and game details have been reworked to refresh properly on any library updates

Playnite Extension

  • Minor bug fixes

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/compare/v0.8.3...v0.8.4

entry.title: New release for LANCommander: v0.8.5
entry.content:
Server

  • Fixed: A bug where settings could potentially be fully wiped out on a bad save has been fixed

Launcher

  • Fixed: A bug where settings could potentially be fully wiped out on a bad save has been fixed
  • Fixed: Library item are sorted by title again
  • Fixed: Removed potential double loading of images into RAM
  • Fixed: Media is now reloaded on import
  • Fixed: Library properly reloads after import, including initial import (#74)
  • Fixed: If the filter only returns one group, games are listed in one list with no collapsable grouping (#77)
  • Fixed: Play/running button in library now reports proper state on start/stop (#78)
  • Fixed: Game engines should now be importing properly
  • Fixed: Typing in filter dropdowns no longer crashes the application
  • Added: Grouping method for library items can now be changed in the filter menu
  • Added: Library can now be filtered by Platform taxonomy

PowerShell

  • Fixed: Required DLLs have been merged into the main LANCommander.PowerShell.dll module. This may reduce issues with Windows' zone identifiers.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LANCommander/LANCommander/compare/v0.8.4...v0.8.5
